edge: Shantanu Moitra is the composer of the soundtrack for the movie '3 Idiots'
Director Rajkumar Hirani collaborated with Shantanu Moitra for the second time for the soundtrack of '3 Idiots'
The music album for '3 Idiots' is the second consecutive collaboration between Shantanu Moitra and Rajkumar Hirani, following their previous work in 'Lage Raho Munna Bhai'
'3 Idiots' is the title of the soundtrack album composed by Shantanu Moitra for the movie
'Lage Raho Munna Bhai' is the title of the soundtrack album composed by Shantanu Moitra for the movie 'Lage Raho Munna Bhai'
Swanand Kirkire penned the lyrics for the songs in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Sonu Nigam rendered five out of seven tracks from the album '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Shaan performed vocals to one or more of the songs in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Shreya Ghoshal performed vocals to one or more of the songs in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Suraj Jagan performed vocals to one or more of the songs in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Jaive Samsun performed vocals to one or more of the songs in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Shantanu Moitra collaborated with Sanjay Wandrekar and Atul Raninga for composing the film score of '3 Idiots'
'Give Me Some Sunshine' is one of the five original compositions featured in '3 Idiots' soundtrack
Sharman Joshi sang one of the tracks, titled 'Give Me Some Sunshine', in his debut attempt at playback singing
'3 Idiots' soundtrack was purchased by T-Series for an amount of ₹120 million (US$2.48 million)
